concept.title: Jython Evaluator
concept.shortdesc: The Jython Evaluator processes data based on custom Jython code. Use the Jython Evaluator to incorporate custom Jython code in a pipeline. The Jython Evaluator supports Jython version 2.7.

conbody.p: Jython Evaluator processoroverviewprocessorsJython EvaluatorThe Jython Evaluator can process data one record at a time or one batch at a time.
When you use a Jython Evaluator in a pipeline, the passes a batch of data to the processor and converts the data to a scripting-friendly data structure for processing.
The Jython Evaluator provides extensive sample code that you can use to develop your script. You can also call external Java code from the script.
